thread.title: Kim Kardashian Learning to Play Piano for a Duet With Hubby Kanye West
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Learning to Play Piano for a Duet With Hubby Kanye West

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kim Kardashian Learning to Play Piano for a Duet With Hubby Kanye West
text:
Comments The high profile couple reportedly is working on a collaboration that Kanye plans to release after the birth of their second child. 
Heavily pregnant with her second child, Kim Kardashian refuses to slow down. She reportedly is learning to play the piano as she plans to make a return to music with a duet alongside rapper husband Kanye West . The Sun was first to report the news. "Kim is excited about the collaboration and has even been learning the piano," a US music insider told The Sun newspaper (via Mirror Online). "Kanye plans to release the song just after Kim has their second child." The high profile couple is expected to welcome their second child, a baby boy, in December later this year. Back in 2011, Kim dropped the tune "Jam (Turn It Up)", featuring background vocals by producer The-Dream . Half of the proceeds from the sales of the song were donated to a children's charity. Music aside, Kim hosted a Troop Beverly Hills-themed baby shower for her friends and family to attend over the weekend. She was joined for the shower by sisters Kourtney Kardashian , Khloe Kardashian , Kendall Jenner , and Kylie Jenner .
